trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Rockingham
There were no other sightings in Rockingham on or around April 15th 1994
divs: Sighting DetailsApprox 10:00 p.m., I witnessed a sight that astonished my wife as well as myself. We left my daughter's home (2 mi from Ellerbe going home). We noticed a bright light more brighter than the sun. We were struck with awe and amazement. We did not say anything to each other until we left the wooded area. I can not say anything about this in my town. I have lived in Ellerbe for 47 years. The church I attend is Presbyterian and they have a different opinion on a lot of things as well as I served on the board of deacons. I know of a person who works with the CIA. I had to keep mum around that individual. I would like to know if someone else has had the same experience as my wife and I have had. If so, e-mail me at wep_1941@yahoo.com. Thanks a lot if you read and believe this report.
